title: Sun in Glory and Other Tales of Valdemar
description:
An all-new original short fiction anthology featuring Mercedes Lackey's heroic Heralds and their horselike companions-as penned by these masters of fantasy 
Errold's Journey
 by Catherine S. McMullen
The Cat Who Came to Dinner
 by Nancy Asire
Winter Death
 by Michelle West
A Herald's Rescue
 by Mickey Zucker Reichert
In the Eye of the Beholder
 by Josepha Sherman
Trance Tower Garrison
 by Fiona Patton
Starhaven
 by Stephanie Shaver
Rebirth
 by Judith Tarr
Brock
 by Tanya Huff
True Colors
 by Michael Longcor
Touches the Earth
 by Brenda Cooper
Icebreaker
 by Rosemary Edghill
Sun in Glory
 by Mercedes Lackey
author: Mercedes Lackey
